name: Crystalloids
tagline: Building crystal-clear data solutions in the cloud
description:
Your Marketing Engineers 
All of our services are in Data, Decision Making and Customer Engagement. From every angle, we can help you innovate, grow and become a more customer-centric organisation using Google Cloud. Our award-winning cases will bring you the agility, scalability and cost-effectiveness that you need to become customer-centric and get you ready for the future.
We offer you state of the art Big Data marketing and analytics solutions built on the Google Cloud Platform. We implement Marketing & Sales and eCommerce solutions on top of it for omnichannel integration, conversational experience, personalisation, mobile marketing and a 360° customer view.
 
Why Crystalloids
Crystalloids applies cutting-edge Google Cloud technology to accelerate organisations throughout their data-driven journey. We are data specialists with applied experience in big data, cloud, machine learning, deep learning and scalable architectures. Combined with our in-depth marketing knowledge we are making the difference.
